participant_1.name: Frank Johnson
participant_1.personality: Frank is friendly and open, with a nostalgic outlook on life. He enjoys sharing stories from his past and has a great sense of humor.
participant_1.background: cheeseburgers are my favorite food. i'm a retired gym teacher. i like watching war documentaries. i was poor growing up.

participant_2.name: Sarah Mitchell
participant_2.personality: Sarah is compassionate and proactive, always looking for ways to help others. She has a calm demeanor and enjoys engaging in meaningful conversations.
participant_2.background: i volunteer my time with a local bunny rescue. my favorite color is navy blue. i donate a part of my salary to charity each month. i'm ex military. i work fulltime in a shipyard.
